text_block_list.text: Summer training camp. To support us through the tough training, food stalls were setup so we could grab a bite to eat during breaks.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: All the veggies at this stall are really good, huh~. The flavor is rich, and they've got a nice shape.

text_block_list.name: Local
text_block_list.text: Gahahaha! I'm glad you're enjoying them! Harvesting them was worth it.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Eh!? Old man, you grew these!? Amazing!!

text_block_list.name: Local
text_block_list.text: Got that right! They turned out pretty well, huh? I like to think that I'm pretty good at growing vegetables! Gahahaha!
I wonder just what his field looks like. As a beginner I was interested, and before I could stop myself――
choice_data_list: Can we take a look at your field!?

text_block_list.name: Local
text_block_list.text: Huh?
There were many well-maintained rows and even a hand-made scarecrow. As someone who's become interested in this, the scenery is exciting.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Oh, for a bird repellant, this is really good! ……Old man! Do you think you could make one of these for us too?

text_block_list.name: Local
text_block_list.text: Sure thing! ……But you know, I never expected a student from that world famous Tracen Academy would be working a field as a hobby……

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: It's way smaller than this one here though! But, when it comes to flavor, I'm confident! Right, Trainer-san!?

text_block_list.name: Local
text_block_list.text: Oooh~! ……But, I'm pretty particular about my tomatoes! Want to take a look?
After that, we exchanged advice and opinions, then promised to help with the harvest tomorrow morning.
However――

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: ……The storm's gotten stronger huh? How'd the evacuation go?
choice_data_list: Seems like it's going fine so far

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: I see. That's good then. …………

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Yeah……but, at this point all you can do is wait. Going out to check on your fields at a time like this is out of the question.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: According to the forecast this'll be over by morning, and then we can go take a look. We made a promise, after all!

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Good morning……yesterday was something, wasn't it?

text_block_list.name: Local
text_block_list.text: ……Yeah. So you guys still came. It's as you can see. There's nothing left.

text_block_list.name: Local
text_block_list.text: Nature is pretty fearsome, isn't it!? Humans are no match for it! Hahaha……

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: That's true……

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: But, standing here worrying about it won't fix anything―― Alright! Then what should we start cleaning up first!?

text_block_list.name: Local
text_block_list.text: ……Ha?

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Right! But, debris in the water might clog up the drainage, so we'll have to clean that up first……
choice_data_list: I'll go borrow some things we need!

text_block_list.name: Local
text_block_list.text: H-hold on a minute! Are you serious!? There's no way we can repair the field if it's like this……

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Then, are you going to give up?

text_block_list.name: Local
text_block_list.text: Wha-! ……Of course I don't want to give up! But, but you see――

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Then there's no reason to hesitate! If you've got a goal in mind, then there's nothing left but to move forward――

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: A small setback like this, we'll blow it away! Then next year, you can treat us to something tasty again!

text_block_list.name: Local
text_block_list.text: B-both of you……sniff――ah, damnit! If you say something like that, then I can't help but get fired up!

text_block_list.name: Local
text_block_list.text: Alright, let's do this! I was looking to fix things from the ground up anyways! At this point, we might as well smash it all and power up!

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: I'm glad~, looks like were able to make it work! That old man, halfway through he had gotten back on his feet and was having fun.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Haha! Trainer-san, seems like you've gotten a bit more reliable~. Even though in the very beginning you fell on your butt because of a bug.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: But even so, 『It was fun』, huh? ……If Trainer-san had been around at that time, I probably would have been having fun too.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Some time before I met Trainer-san, there was a day where the rain was extremely heavy.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Just like with this time, when I went to check on the field in the morning, and everything was just one big mess……

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: That was the first time I'd seen a field left like that on my own. Usually I had my family with me, you see.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: There was never a day where I wanted to just leave and go home more than that day.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: If everyone was there, then we'd all be saying how awful it was. But, together we'd end up getting all muddy, but we'd be laughing the entire time.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: ……But! I don't think a day like that will ever come again.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: (After all――)

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: After all, Y'see―― I've got Trainer-san with me!
Katsuragi Ace had that mischievious smile on her face again. The look she gave me this time, had none of the shadows of doubt from before.
choice_data_list: Of course! ……Just look at these biceps!
Of course! ……Just look at these biceps!

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Hmmm~……biceps? Where? Pretty sure if anyone had them, it would be me――

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Pfft, you've got a really frustrated look on your face! Kukukuu……Ahahahahahaa!!
I couldn't help but laugh along with Katsuragi Ace. Maybe that's why I realized, I was suddenly really tired.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: ……Fuwaaa~~ Fufu, Trainer-san, I see you passed that yawn along.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Guess I'll take it easy for a little bit longer…… it's nice and sunny still too……

text_block_list.name: Ace's Classmate A
text_block_list.text: Waah! Ace and Trainer-san are leaning against each other and sleeping? Ehh~ it's just like a youthful drama~♪

text_block_list.name: Ace's Classmate B
text_block_list.text: Seriously, they get along so well~. I'll snap a pic and show her later.
